original_text: From the half which belongs to the soldiers, keep one part out of every 500. Do that with the Midianite prisoners, the cows, the donkeys and the sheep. Those parts will be for the Lord.
korean_text: 전쟁에 나갔던 군인들은 사람이나 소나 나귀나 양 떼의 오백분의 일을 여호와께 드릴지니라

sentences.original_text: From the half which belongs to the soldiers
keep one part out of every 500
Do that with the Midianite prisoners
the cows, the donkeys and the sheep
Those parts will be for the Lord
